title: index
content:
Hi there! I'm EJ Fox, a hacker-journalist using code and art to uncover hidden patterns. I try to use my skills to empower others to explore those connections. I believe the world is interconnected and editable, and by using technology for good we can empower people to change the world for the better. I founded room302.studio, an innovation lab, to take on even larger projects and datasets. If you're interested in a fresh take on some data or just want to chat, reach out at ejfox@ejfox.com or grab some time on my calendar.


Or, if you'd like, browse some of my work, read my blog posts, or check out my resume.
